 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫עַל‎</span> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Josh.9.5|Josh 9:5]]</sup> ==sandal, shoe== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.*** (also ***horse-shoe***, etc.); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> apparently only ***horse-shoe*** (rare; also NS) [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2405</sup>; compare possibly Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (obsolete) ***wife of Levirate marriage*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>676</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Gen.14.23|Gen 14:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָ֑עַל‎</span> [[Deut.25.10|Deut 25:10]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲלִי‎</span> [[Ps.60.10|Ps 60:10]]; [[Ps.108.10|Ps 108:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעַלְךָ‎</span> [[Josh.5.15|Josh 5:15]], etc.; dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲלָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Amos.2.6|Amos 2:6]]; [[Amos.8.6|Amos 8:6]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעָילִם‎</span> [[Isa.11.15|Isa 11:15]]; [[Song.7.2|Song 7:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעָלוֺת‎</span> [[Josh.9.5|Josh 9:5]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעָלֶיךָ‎</span> [[Exod.3.5|Exod 3:5]]; [[Ezek.24.17|Ezek 24:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעָלָיו‎</span> [[Isa.5.27|Isa 5:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעָלֵינוּ‎</span> [[Josh.9.13|Josh 9:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲלֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Exod.12.11|Exod 12:11]]; [[Ezek.24.23|Ezek 24:23]] — ***sandal*** [[Judg.9.13|Judg 9:13]]; [[Amos.2.6|Amos 2:6]]; [[Amos.8.6|Amos 8:6]] (dual = pair of sandals; mentioned as of little worth); [[Deut.29.4|Deut 29:4]] on (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) feet [[Josh.9.5|Josh 9:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Kgs.2.5|1Kgs 2:5]]; [[Ezek.24.23|Ezek 24:23]]; [[Exod.12.11|Exod 12:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּעָמַיִךְ בַּנְּעָלִים‎</span> [[Song.7.2|Song 7:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִדְרִיךְ בַּנ‎</span> [[Isa.11.15|Isa 11:15]] ***put on sandal*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרֶגֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים נ‎</span> [[Ezek.24.17|Ezek 24:17]] ***loose the sandal*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָלַץ‎</span> [[Isa.20.2|Isa 20:2]]; [[Deut.25.9|Deut 25:9]] compare v[[Deut.25.10|Deut 25:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁל‎</span> (Imperative) [[Exod.3.5|Exod 3:5]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.5.15|Josh 5:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַף‎</span> [[Ruth.4.7|Ruth 4:7]]; [[Ruth.4.8|Ruth 4:8]] (compare Burton<sup>Midian ii. 197</sup>); ***sandal-thong*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂרוֺךְ‎</span> [[Gen.14.23|Gen 14:23]]; [[Isa.5.27|Isa 5:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלאֱֿדוֺם אַשְׁלִיךְ נַעֲלִי‎</span> [[Ps.60.10|Ps 60:10]] ***upon Edom do I cast my sandal*** = [[Ps.108.10|Ps 108:10]], denotes either contempt ([[BDB#Hup|Hup]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> = ***unto***, figurative of slave), or taking possession of ([[BDB#Fl|Fl]] in [[BDB#De|De]], [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]), \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺאָב סִיר רַחְצִי‎</span> favoursformer. — On symbolic use of sandal see further Goldziher<sup>Abh. z. Arab. Philol. i. 47 f.</sup> [[BDB#Jacob|Jacob]]<sup>Arab. Dicht. iv. 23</sup>.
